body.name: HOMCOM Rollaway Bed, Folding Bed with 3.25" Mattress, Portable Foldable Guest Bed with Adjustable Backrest, and Metal Frame on Wheels, Light Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
features: Extra Bed for A Guest: You can unfold this guest bed in minutes without any additional tools. When a guest comes to stay at your home, take it out and put it in your extra living room space for a quick solution to not having a guest room.

Space-Saving: The foldable bed overcomes the shortcomings of traditional mattresses that are large and not easy to store. When not in use, it can be easily folded in half and placed in the corner of your room for saving space.

Great Comfort: The mattress is made of 3.25" thick sponge, providing a comfortable sleeping experience. You can adjust the bed's backrest to 5 different angles; you can freely choose the lying angle you like. The steel support frame allows this bed to hold up to 330lbs.

Flexible Mobility: The eight caster wheels make it a breeze for all ages to transport and store these portable beds for guests, it can be moved by 1 person easily. You can lock four wheels in place, so the folding bed doesn’t roll around while in use.
Folding Bed Information: Overall Dimensions: 74.75" W x 30" D x 13" H, Folding Dimensions: 41" W x 30" D x 9.75" H. Weight Capacity: 330 lbs.
body.description: Are you worried that there are no beds available for unexpected guests? HOMCOM folding bed will solve your troubles. With this cot bed, you can quickly and easily create space for overnight guests. No additional space is required. As long as the bed frame is pulled away, you will be able to provide a bed to the guests immediately. When not in use, you can fold it up and place it in corner to save your space. With rolling wheels, you can move your bed to wherever you want freely. Foldable design for saving your space and easy storage; Thick padded cushion offers comfortable sleeping experience; 2 storage bags on both sides of mattress for storing remote control or other items; 5-level adjustable backrest angle for your different needs; 2 handrails for getting on and off the bed easier; Steel frame ensures durability and stability;

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Spice up your home office with our exciting line of computer desks and comfortable chairs, or upgrade your kitchen with our rolling trolley carts and storage racks. Beautiful leather ottomans, designer furniture options, and decorative accessories are all available to add a new dimension to whatever space you are trying to complete. Are you worried that there are no beds available for unexpected guests? HOMCOM folding bed will solve your troubles. With this cot bed, you can quickly and easily create space for overnight guests. No additional space is required. As long as the bed frame is pulled away, you will be able to provide a bed to the guests immediately. When not in use, you can fold it up and place it in corner to save your space. With rolling wheels, you can move your bed to wherever you want freely. Foldable design for saving your space and easy storage; Thick padded cushion offers comfortable sleeping experience; 2 storage bags on both sides of mattress for storing remote control or other items; 5-level adjustable backrest angle for your different needs; 2 handrails for getting on and off the bed easier; Steel frame ensures durability and stability;

Color Light Grey Mattress, Black Frame; Material Steel, Sponge, Fabric (100% Polyester); Overall Dimension 74.75"W x 30"D x 13"H; Folding Dimension 41"W x 30"D x 9.75"H; Handrail Length 21.5"; Handrail Height to bed surface 4.75"; Storage Bag Size 9.75"W x 7.5"H; Mattress Thickness 3.25"; Item Label 831-517CG;

Good Quality We use selected materials and qualified factories to produce our products, and each product has been checked many times throughout the production process to ensure that it is intact. Nice-looking We work hard to create popular, chic, and innovative items that can pass the test of time and help you live better. With stability,comfort in mind, our products will be your best choice. Versatile Use We create simple but unique designs to make our furniture blend perfectly with your home environment whether it's from your kitchen to your dining room, or from your bedroom to your living room. Everything in Order We dedicate to helping you keep everything well organized and try to offer you storage space as much as possible. Refresh your home immediately with the storage space we provided!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product for guest sleepovers or while caring for a loved one
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. The mattress could be thicker for added comfort however adding a fluffy comforter solved that easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and the kids approve
reviews.reviewText: Has been used once and the Grandkids love it I like the arm rest because my Granddaughter flips around so much that she rolls out of bed these help keep her in and she is 8 yrs old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The description says “Great Comfort” it was easy enough to put together but when I was laying on the cot it felt very hard - this bed is for a guest and I will have to now buy some kind of padding - I would be embarrassed to have someone sleep on this - sorry I cannot give this bed a good review- very dissatisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and transport
reviews.reviewText: My uncle really could not sit and do his chemotherapy so we bought this bed to help him. He slept like a baby for 5 hours. We ended up donating it to the Oncoligist so that other patients could lie down instead of sit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very nice to lay down, wish frame didn’t stick out so far when sitting straight up. It’s nice and Sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Bed
reviews.reviewText: I needed a foldable bed for afternoon naps. I can easily take this bed for a comfortable nap anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very low to the ground
reviews.reviewText: This bed is super low to the ground! Not at all the height is says it is!
